product_name: Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim Jeans - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: With traditional blue-jean style and fit, plus performance features like stretch and a Durable Water Repellent coating, the Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim jeans keep you moving in comfort. Jeans are made with a stretchy blend of cotton, polyester and spandex, and have a comtemporary fit with straight legs. Fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. The Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim jeans have a standard five-pocket design.
short_description: With traditional blue-jean style and fit, plus performance features like stretch and a Durable Water Repellent coating, the Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim jeans keep you moving in comfort.
